summary: THE TRANSMISSION CRACKED, WHICH CAUSED FLUID TO LEAK.   *JB   THE REPAIR DEALER STATED THAT THE TRANSMISSION CASE HOUSING WAS CRACKED AND CAUSED LOST OF FLUID AND PREMATURE FAILURE OF THE TRANSAXLE ASSEMBLY.  THIS OCCURRED DUE TO POOR DESIGN AND WAS A COMMON PROBLEM IN THESE VEHICLES.   *SC  *JB
